title: Eligibility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
custom_expected: AND user is eligible to receive prizes (user is from the USA or Canada but nor Quebec province)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user has a country of Residence set to the USA
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is eligible for prizing
AND user sees the Prize section on Profile page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user has a country of Residence set to Canada - Quebec
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is NOT eligible for prizing
AND user DOES NOT see the Prize section on Profile page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user has a country of Residence set to Canada - any other provinces besides Quebec
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is eligible for prizing
AND user sees the Prize section on Profile page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user has a country of Residence set to any other country besides USA and Canada
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is NOT eligible for prizing
AND user DOES NOT see the Prize section on Profile page

title: Prize assets
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user is eligible to receive prizes (user is from the USA or Canada but nor Quebec province)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user receives a prize
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the prize assets can include for the following Prize types:

* MLB.TV subscriptions
* StubHub ticket vouchers/credit
* MLB: The Show stubs (virtual currency)
* MLB: The Show full game
* MLB Shop gift certificates ($5, 10, 25, 50, 100, 250, 500)
* MLB Shop merchandise (Jersey, Cap, T-shirt Jersey)
* Autographed memorabilia (Bat, Ball, Jersey)
* Topps Baseball Cards (Individual, Pack, Multiple Packs, or a Box)

title: Receiving a prize
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user is logged in

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user receives a prize
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN there should only be one Prize delivered at a time in this event
AND the Prize should be delivered at the same time as a Legendary Reward Pack

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user receives a modal
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the header of the modal should read: “Your Tokens Unlocked a Prize!”

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user earns a Prize as part of multiple Celebration Modals
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Prize should be after the Reward Pack it is associated with in the queue

title: Badge Prize
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user is logged in

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user earns a Badge that is associated with Prizes
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user should be given a Reward Pack with a single asset (Prize) at the same time as the Badge

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user earns a Prize as part of multiple Celebration Modals
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Prize should be after the Badge it is associated with in the queue

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the modal
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the header of the modal should read: “Your Badge Unlocked a Prize!”
AND the rest of the modal should be exactly the same as Prize Detail Modal (Prize title, Prize copy, Prize CTA)

title: App/Play Store Listings
custom_steps: WHEN user views MLB Play in App/Store Play
custom_expected: THEN user sees up-to-date information on prizing in MLB Play on the store listing with the appropriate Rules and Disclaimers

title: Prizes section
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in
ADD user is on the profile page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user scrolls down
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user sees the prize section; below the friends section and above the reactions earned section

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the prizing section
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with: 
* 'Prizes' title
* number of prizes earned and number of available prizes in x/x format
* 3 images of prizes or prizes placeholders
* 'See All' link

AND Prizes should be sorted in the following order:
- First, prizes that the user has earned most recently
- Then, prizes that more MLB Play users have earned (if the user has not earned 3 prizes)
AND there should always be three prizes displayed, even if the user has not earned three

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the prize or prize placeholders
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought to My Prizes page (separate TC)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'See All'
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought to Prizes page (separate TC)

title: My Prizes page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in
ADD user is on the profile page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views My Prizes page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with: 
* 'My Prizes' title
* back arrow on the top left corner
* copy 'Earn prizes for completing tasks. Tap any prize to view its description and rarity. For more information visit Prize Legalese'
* list of 5 prize categories: MLB Store, Seat Geek, MLB The Show, Topps, MLB.tv
* 'View' cta next to each prize category

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on back arrow
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought to the Profile page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on visit Prize Legalese
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to ...

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the view cta
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought to the prize category page (sepatrate TC)

* name of the prize

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the arrow

title: Redeem flow - email
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in
AMD user has an available prize

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user navigates to Profile -> Prizes Page -> Prize Category
AND selects the redeemable prize
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought to the Prize Detail page (Prize Details Modal - earned prize TC)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'Redeem Now' CTA
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taking to Redeem Email page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with:

* 'Request Prize' header
copy 'Please confirm your email address and press “Confirm,” then we’ll reach out to you with instructions on how to redeem this prize in the next 5 business days' - this copy is dynamic. This copy could not be present if it's empty in spanner for your uid
* 'Instructions on how to redeem your prize will be sent to:' copy
* User's Email Address (non clickable)
* 'Confirm' button

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks 'Confirm'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN 'Request Submitted' is displayed at the bottom
AND 'Confirm' button is disabled

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks back on the prize
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is brought back to Prize page
AND 'Request Submitted' text is displayed
AND 'Need help? Contact customer service'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the 'Contact customer service' link
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to https://www.mlb.com/official-information/contact?partnerId=playapp-web_referral&rsid=qamlbglobal%2Cqamlbplay&adobe_mc=MCMID%3D08179937358131714631711719643661281210%7CMCORGID%3DA65F776A5245B01B0A490D44%2540AdobeOrg%7CTS%3D1678907991

title: Redeem flow - code
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AMD user has an available prize

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user navigates to Profile -> Prizes Page -> Prize Category
AND selects the redeemable prize
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought to the Prize Detail page (Prize Details Modal - earned prize TC)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'Redeem Now' CTA
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taking to Redeem Code page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with: 

* 'Get Code' header
* redeem instruction
* Code field
* 'Tap to Copy Code' copy underneath the code
* 'Done' cta

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user copies the code (by clicking on it)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the code background changes to gray
AND the copy underneath it is changed to 'Copied!'
AND user is able to paste this code

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'Done'
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought back to 'Prizes' page

custom_steps_separated.expected:

* Prize image

* prize description. Example: The MLB.TV Month Prize could read: “You can earn this prize through the following badge challenges: Beat the Streak: 25 Streak; Diamond Derby: Perfect Game; Bingo: X”

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on back arrow
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought back to Prize category page

title: Confirmation email
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user submitted the request for prizing
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user receives a confirmation email

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the confirmation email
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with: 

Subject: Your MLB Play Prize Request Confirmation

Reply-to: play@mlb.com

Body: Thank you for confirming your email with MLB Play. We’ll reach out in 5 business days regarding your Prize: [Prize name].

title: EC - redeeming prize twice
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user received a prize 
AND tried to redeem it again
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is not able to  redeem it again

title: EC - redeeming prize - incorrect email address
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user received a prize 
AND user incorrectly submits their email address
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is not able to  redeem it 
AND user can only rectify this by contacting Customer Support

title: Prize Celebration modal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user earns a Prize through a Badge
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the title should say 'Your Badge Unlocked a Prize!'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user earns a Prize through a Reward Pack
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the title should say 'Your Tokens Unlocked a Prize!'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the modal
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be displayed with: 

* Prize image
* Prize name
* Prize description
* copy '“You can redeem this Prize by going to the Prizes screen on the Profile Tab.”'

AND the modal is shown AFTER the relevant event’s celebration modal. For example, if the Prize is associated with the Beat the Streak 10 Streak badge, show the badge celebration modal and then show the Prize modal next.

title: New prize modal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user is logged in

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN new prize is available
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the title should say 'Your Badge Unlocked a Prize!'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user earns a Prize through a Reward Pack
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the title should say 'Your Tokens Unlocked a Prize!'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the modal
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be displayed with:

* Prize image
* Prize name
* Prize description
* copy '“You can redeem this Prize by going to the Prizes screen on the Profile Tab.”'
AND the modal is shown AFTER the relevant event’s celebration modal. For example, if the Prize is associated with the Beat the Streak 10 Streak badge, show the badge celebration modal and then show the Prize modal next.

title: Prizing Feature Awareness Modal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN a current MLB Play user opening the app after the Prizing feature has been implemented
custom_expected: THEN user receives a modal that details what Prizes are and how user can earn them so that user knows to make use of the feature.

title: Sign Up
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play web app is opened on browser
AND user is going through the Sign Up flow

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user is on the Sign Up page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with: 
* 'Sign Up' title
* back arrow on the top left corner
* copy "Create an MLB account to play the games and get access to exclusive MLB content'
* Email Address, Nickname, Password, Birthday MM/DD/YY and Country of Residence fields
* Sign Up button (disabled)
*'Have an account already? Log In' copy

AND all fields are required and have asterisks

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user selects any field and it's in focus
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the field has a blue outline

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user enters incorrect input for any field besides Country of Residence and Province
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the field has a red outline and the error message underneath it

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the back arrow
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought to the Welcome page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'Log In'
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought to Log In page

title: Sign Up - Country of Residence
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play web app is opened on browser
AND user is going through the Sign Up flow

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the 'Country of Residence' field
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user sees 'Country of Residence' inside the field
AND 'Country of Residence' is not pre-filled
AND copy 'If your country is not listed, choose “Other”' is displayed underneath the text field

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on that field
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN 'Country of Residence' moved to the top borderline
AND drop down list appears

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user scrolls through the drop down list
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with a drop-down list with the following countries in order:

United States
Australia
Canada
China
Colombia
Cuba
Dominican Republic
France
Germany
India
Israel
Italy
Japan
Mexico
Netherlands
Panama
Puerto Rico
South Korea
Taiwan
United Kingdom
Venezuela
Other

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user selects Canada
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN an additional drop-down field is displayed (separate TC)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user selects any other country
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN no additional drop-down field is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user selects Country of Residence
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Sign Up button gets active

title: Sign Up - Province
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play web app is opened on browser
AND user is going through the Sign Up flow
AND user selected Canada as Residence

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user selects Canada
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN an additional drop-down field is displayed asking them to declare their Province (listed in alphabetical order)

Alberta
British Columbia
Manitoba
New Brunswick
Newfoundland and Labrador
Northwest Territories
Nova Scotia
Nunavut
Ontario
Prince Edward Island
Quebec
Saskatchewan
Yukon

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user selects a province
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Sign UP button gets active

title: Log In - Update Your Account
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play web app is opened on browser
AND user going through the Log In flow with existing account (created before 2023 season)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user Logs In
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to 'Update Your Account' page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user is viewing 'Update Your Account' page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with: 

* 'Update Your Account' title
* back arrow in the top left corner
* 'To complete your log in, update your MLB account by creating a nickname and providing your birthdate.' copy
* Nickname, Birthdate, Country of Residence field
* 'If your country is not listed, choose “Other”' copy underneath the Country of Residence field
* 'Update & Log In' button
* 'Don’t have an account? Sign Up' copy

AND all fields are required and have asterisks

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the back arrow
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought to Log In page or Welcome page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on Sign Up
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought to Sign Up page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user fills all 3 fields
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN 'Update & Log In' button gets active

title: Base Chase: Stacked
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
